message: Let's get this done quickly. Take this offer, Bob, before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering you a fair 30% before inflation takes a bigger chunk out of what I can offer.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a generous offer considering the inflation working against you.  Don't let greed lead to an even smaller share!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take the 40% before inflation shrinks the pot even further. It's in both our best interests to settle now.
